channel.title: [508] HD custom client [HELP]
channel.description:
I am DemonWars Owner and Coder of RSDW (blablabla)
is there a 508 HD custom client (with .java files to add or edit items), i have the dragonscape client it has some custom models, but no .java files so i cant add models and items.
please reply with a link to a HD custom client

item.title: [508] HD custom client [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @DemonWars DemonWars
item.description:
@DemonWars wrote:

thanks

i have added models and stuff, although i still get some glitches, like:

i have added a d plate (to a mith platebody) but when i wear it i do get the body itself but the sleeves are still blue.

and i cant get a hold on the ints:

modelRotation1: anInt2317 modelRotation2: anInt2286 modelZoom: anInt2273 Value: anInt2288 femaleWield: anInt2264 maleWield: anInt2274 femaleArm: anInt2322 maleArm: anInt2255 certID: anInt2268

i dont know wich one is for the items name, is there a way to add a variable so it will take the normal “anInt” of the hd ones and so ill b able to add the same codes from my LD client?

Read full topic

item.title: [508] HD custom client [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

http://www.mediafire.com/?yywog1ydkyd

next time remember no requests and this is a client help thing

meh i might aswell post my custom model loading from r-s

to be nice heres my tut which i gave 1 error cause i was bored if im not mistaken

[SPOILER=“tut”][size=14pt]first this loads from cache u must fix urself(thats the error i gave so you can l2program[/size]

tested on: hotyutes hd client

Open up Class14_Sub8_Sub24 and search for

if (!Class14_Sub3.aBoolean2752 && class142_1_.aBoolean2306)

u should see the itemdef

if (!Class14_Sub3.aBoolean2752 && class142_1_.aBoolean2306) { class142_1_.aBoolean2275 = false; class142_1_.aClass124Array2263 = null; class142_1_.anInt2310 = 0; class142_1_.aClass124_2296 = Class133_Sub3.aClass124_3568; class142_1_.aClass124Array2304 = null; }

refractored version

if (!Class14_Sub3.isMember && ItemDef.membersObject) { ItemDef.stackable= false; ItemDef.groundActions = null; ItemDef.team = 0; ItemDef.itemName = Class14_Sub2_Sub2.forString(1178, "Members Object"); ItemDef.itemActions = null; }

scroll down till u see

} catch (RuntimeException runtimeexception) { break; } return class142;

now add this switch before return class142;

switch(arg1) { default: case 3101: class142.anInt2274 = 14997; break; }

i added an example as u can see

now open class 133_sub2 and search for

 public static Class133_Sub2 method1824(Class9 arg0, int arg1, int arg2) {

replace that method with this

public static Class133_Sub2 method1824(Class9 arg0, int arg1, int arg2) { try { if(ModelLoader.models == null) new ModelLoader(); for (int modelStored : ModelLoader.models) if(modelStored == i) return new Class133_Sub2(ModelLoader.loadNewModel(modelStored)); byte[] is = arg0.method163(arg2, arg1, 0); if (is == null) return null; return new Class133_Sub2(is); } catch(Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } return null; }

now make a java file named ModelLoader.java and put this in it

[code]import java.io.;
import java.util.;

public class ModelLoader {

public static List<Integer> models = null;

public ModelLoader()
{
	loadArray();
}

public static byte[] loadNewModel(int i) throws IOException
{
	DataInputStream dis = new DataInputStream(new FileInputStream("./models/"+i+".dat"));
	byte[] buffer = new byte[(int) new File("./models/"+i+".dat").length()];
	dis.readFully(buffer);
	dis.close();
	return buffer;
}

public void loadArray()
{
	models = new ArrayList<Integer>();
	File[] m = new File("./models").listFiles();
	for (File model : m)
		if(model.getName().contains(".dat"))
			models.add(Integer.parseInt(model.getName().substring(0, model.getName().indexOf(".dat"))));
}

}[/code]

then compile

if you got errors then u fail

ids

modelRotation1: anInt2317
modelRotation2: anInt2286
modelZoom: anInt2273
Value: anInt2288
femaleWield: anInt2264
maleWield: anInt2274
femaleArm: anInt2322
maleArm: anInt2255
certID: anInt2268

credits:

zee best = modelloader
hotyute = client
me = changing modelloading to hd

pic

2lccuq.png1276×882
[/SPOILER]

Read full topic
